description:
Ataru has peculiar gift for Lum that`ll take her powers away, but little does he know that she has some odd tchotchkes of her own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dengeki Shock ga Kowai! / Nenriki Urami no Ayatsuri Ningyou
Electric Shocks Scare Me / Voodoo Dolls of Vengeance
電撃ショックが こわい! - 念力ウラミの あやつり人形
